titles.title: Atlantic Coastal Fisheries Act of 2000
Atlantic Coastal Fisheries Act of 2000
To reauthorize the Atlantic Coastal Fisheries Cooperative Management Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 106-804.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 465.

action.text: Mr. Saxton moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 4840.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 9/12/2000--Passed House amended. Atlantic Coastal Fisheries Act of 2000 - Authorizes appropriations for the Atlantic Coastal Fisheries Cooperative Management Act through FY 2005. Permits using amounts authorized to support the Atlantic States Marine Fishery Commission's cooperative statistics program. Imposes reporting requirements.
